dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Nearly 66% of Warren Buffett's Portfolio Is Invested in These 5 Stocks as 2025 Begins
News Content: Nearly 66% of Warren Buffett's Portfolio Is Invested in These 5 Stocks as 2025 Begins

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: -1, Prediction of stock price falling: -1
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Round: 1
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.68, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.32

Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.75, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.25
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.72, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.28
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3

Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.73, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.27
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.78, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.22
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.75, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.25

Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
"reasoning": "The financial news indicates that nearly 66% of Warren Buffett's portfolio is invested in five stocks, with Apple being one of them. This suggests a strong endorsement from Warren Buffett, a highly respected investor. The trend of previous predictions shows a consistent and increasing belief in the stock price rising, with most models predicting a higher probability of the stock price rising than falling. There is no negative information provided in the news that would counteract this bullish sentiment. Therefore, it is reasonable to predict a higher probability of the stock price rising.",
"company_name": "Apple Inc.",
"company_symbol": "AAPL",
"news_headline": "Nearly 66% of Warren Buffett's Portfolio Is Invested in These 5 Stocks as 2025 Begins",
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.75,
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.25
}
```
